title: Ahri
body: It seems that Riot failed to make Ahri {{champion:103}} is the most beautiful and charm champion in summoners' rift. The new Eve{{champion:28}}  is the most charm champion now. Eve's sounds and outlooking make her more charm than Ahri. I remembered Riot said they will make Ahri is the most beautiful lady in summoners' rift...

replies.body: Evelynn is like that because she's much more recent, so they might fiddle with the state of things if they eventually give Ahri a VU (or VGU). Beauty is subjective, though, therefore Riot can't really help it if you find Evelynn more attractive.
I agree with what you said. I like Ahri. I think she is the most beautiful creature. But I am always thinking she needs more care but Riot didn't do that.

except eve doesnt let you touch her she kills you before anything happens and i dont think that beautifull at all, while Ahri gives and takes ( ͡° ل͜ ͡°)  so shes batter 

also SG Ahri is much much better than her normal skin or any other of her skins so, yeah
Yep, But it will better for Ahri more evil since she kills people and have their spirits. Hahaha...
